LoginQuery: SELECT User.UserId,USER.RoleId,MEMBER.MemberId, MEMBER.DesignationId, USER.UserName,USER.Password,ROLE.Name AS Role,DESIGNATION.Name AS Designation,DESIGNATION.Hierarchy_Value,DESIGNATION.Membership_Fee, MEMBER.Status AS Member_Status,MEMBER.Joined_Date,MEMBER.Membership_Renew_Status,MEMBER.Last_Renewed_Date FROM `user` User LEFT JOIN `role` ROLE ON ROLE.RoleId = USER.RoleId LEFT JOIN `member` MEMBER ON MEMBER.UserId = USER.UserId LEFT JOIN `designation` DESIGNATION ON DESIGNATION.DesignationId = MEMBER.DesignationId WHERE UserName = ? AND Password = ?
RolePermisionPaginated: SELECT  RP.RoleId, RP.PermissionId,R.Name AS Role, R.Remarks As Role_Remarks, P.Name AS Permission , P.Remarks AS Permission_Remarks, RP.Status As RolePermission_Status FROM `rolepermission` RP RIGHT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId RIGHT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.RoleId = ? LIMIT ? OFFSET ?
RolePermisionByRoleId: SELECT  RP.RoleId, RP.PermissionId,R.Name AS Role, R.Remarks As Role_Remarks, P.Name AS Permission , P.Remarks AS Permission_Remarks, RP.Status As RolePermission_Status FROM `rolepermission` RP RIGHT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId RIGHT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.RoleId = ?
RolePermisionCount: SELECT  count(*) AS Total_Count FROM `rolepermission` RP RIGHT JOIN `role` R ON R.RoleId = RP.RoleId RIGHT JOIN `permission` P ON P.PermissionId = RP.PermissionId WHERE RP.RoleId = ?
